title: Discovery of a novel benzimidazole conjugated quinazolinone derivative as a promising SARS-CoV-2 3CL protease inhibitor
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33820-33829
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03267E, Paper
Open Access

Bui Thi Buu Hue, Huynh Nguyet Huong Giang, Cuong Quoc Nguyen, Feng-Pai Chou, Danh La Duc Thanh, Quang De Tran, Vo Trung Hieu, Lam Hoang Phuong Mai, Hong-Cheu Lin, Tung-Kung Wu
This report presents the design and synthesis of quinazolinone-based derivatives as promising SARS-CoV-2 3CL protease inhibitors.
